about_the_game:
Discover the fascinating world of the zodiac signs as you embark on a journey to win the heart of the boy of your dreams.

Immerse yourself in a unique experience where each answer will not only unveil his personality but also the intriguing characteristics linked to his astrological sign.

In this thrilling game, each question is designed to unravel the mysteries of the zodiac, allowing you to get to know these boys in an entirely new way.

Features:

-Unlock images of the boys on the beach and discover their zodiac traits.

-As you progress, questions become more personal and linked to their zodiac sign.

-Different endings depending on how many questions you answer and how you interpret astrological signals.

-Unlock the secret features of each boy.

-Discover the secret and spicy question the boys will ask you in question 150, related to astrology.

Are you able to decipher the astrological signs and earn their trust? Find out in this new and exciting adventure.

name: Beach Boys: Zodiac date

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 o AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti o AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible con DirectX 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 o AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti o AMD Radeon RX 560, 4 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible con DirectX 11

short_description: Discover the fascinating world of the zodiac signs as you embark on a journey to win the heart of the boy of your dreams.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
